text: You deserve the love you so freely give to others.
author: Unknown

text: Romanticize your own life. You are the main character.
author: Unknown

text: Softness is not weakness. It is strength in bloom.
author: Unknown

text: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

text: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line.
author: Lucille Ball

text: Owning our story and loving ourselves through that process is the bravest thing that we'll ever do.
author: Brené Brown

text: I don't like to gamble, but if there's one thing I'm willing to bet on, it's myself.
author: Beyoncé

text: You are enough just as you are!
author: Meghan Markle

text: Be you, love you. All ways, always.
author: Alexandra Elle

text: It is interesting how often we can't see all the ways in which we are being strong.
author: Lena Dunham

text: Your self-worth is determined by you. You don't have to depend on someone telling you who you are.
author: Beyoncé

text: Don't waste your energy trying to change opinions ... Do your thing, and don't care if they like it.
author: Tina Fey

text: Treat yourself like someone you love.
author: Glennon Doyle

text: Keep taking time for yourself until you're you again.
author: Lalah Delia

text: Be bold, be brave enough to be your true self.
author: Queen Latifah

text: Every exit is an entrance to someplace else.
author: Patti LaBelle

text: Love. Laugh. And live it up!
author: Christie Brinkley

text: Love yourself. Be clear on how you want to be treated. Know your worth. Always.
author: Maryam Hasnaa

text: You are more important than you'll ever know.
author: Unknown

text: How you love yourself is how you teach others to love you.
author: Rupi Kaur

text: Be not afraid of growing slowly; be afraid only of standing still.
author: Chinese Proverb

text: To fall in love with yourself is the first secret to happiness.
author: Robert Morely

text: Stay true to yourself. An original is worth more than a copy.
author: Suzy Kassem
